column5: i have heard great things about the perch fishing in lake simco. my sons girlfriend is just getting her feet wet on fishing and i was thinking that a few days of perching might be just what it takes to get her on board with it. when would be a good time to go, where to fish and stay etc. any suggestions would be greatly appreciated
My first suggestion is that you learn how to spell Lake SIMCOE.
Try this link here and see if it helpshttp://www.fishinglakesimcoe.com
